name: Neopin
description: NEOPIN is an AMM-based, Permissioned DeFi protocol, offering a non-custodial wallet and DeFi platform that bridges the gap between DeFi and TradFi to ensure a secure and compliant environment for users. Since 2023, in partnership with the Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM), NEOPIN has been at the forefront of developing the world's first DeFi regulatory framework, showcasing our commitment to innovation within the UAE's premier financial free zone. Dedicated to revolutionizing the DeFi landscape, NEOPIN is setting new industry standards by pioneering Real World Asset (RWA). Our goal is to establish NEOPIN as Asia's leading DeFi powerhouse by introducing innovative, asset-based products that underscore our commitment to innovation and market leadership.
